ygData.subject: Thnx
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you for all that posted on ideas...and I do see that most of you are right about players being cheaper...I came from a game that players were too high of
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you for all that posted on ideas...and I do see that most of you are
right about players being cheaper...I came from a game that players were too
high of price and the best thing to do is to find the stuff yourself or find
some one that didn't have a clue what they had...every since I played EQ...I
have found it to be a breath of fresh air....I have not found one greifer,
scammer or just a pure pain in the arse. I have found alot of friendly
players that do help out new players...
